Text: RE Location for our meetingSee you then Original Message From McConnell Mark Sent Thursday October AM To Windle Bill Watson Kimberly Bolks Sean Subject Location for our meeting I have secured EN for the meeting between the weather desk and TW Mark McConnell Transwestern Pipeline Company office cell fax

Weather Risk ManagementMark Thanks for the opportunity to meet with you and the rest of the Transwestern team Attached is a generic overview of the Weather Marketsplease call with questions I look forward to working with you

FW DTE EnergyJeff Below is a note from Bob Beyer our Weather Originator in the Chicago office He has been working with DTE on structured term CDD putthought you would like know Bill Original Message From Beyer Bob Sent Friday October AM To Windle Bill Cc Tawney Mark Subject DTE Energy I had a conversation yesterday with Paul Burgener Corp Risk Mgr at DTE in Detroit He told me that cash transactions with Enron are business as usual but that all term trades now receive increased scrutiny and are to be avoided particularly if a reasonable substitute existsThough he did not go so far as to say we were cut off its clear to Pauls group that term trades with Enron are not career enhancers
